main.name: Atul Rauthan
main.description: Opentext ECM Consultant by day, Front End Developer & Thinker by night!
main.bio: I am currently working as an ECM Consultant with Causeway Software Technologies Pvt. Ltd. I also work on front end development projects on a personal front. Other than this, I shoot photos and make videos as TheMegaPixelArt.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details.

resume.skillmessage: ECM, Front-End Web Development, Photography and Cinematography

work.title: Application Development Analyst
work.description: Supporting ECM for Multinational Food Processing Client

projects.title: MERN Stack WhatsApp Clone
projects.category: WhatsApp Clone built with MERN (MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS)

testimonials.text: I had some time to be with Atul. I found him to be very hard working professional, with excellent OpenText WebReports and Workflow development skills. You can count on him to get the job done. His attitude is excellent.

Atul is one of the most technically strong and proficient consultants that I have worked with. He consistently brought high value to our team by solving complex technical issues and by thinking strategically on how to best optimize our system and service. He has a potential to grow to great heights in his career. KUDOS!
testimonials.user: Sidhi Kumar RJ, ECM Consultant, Avaali Solutions
